comment.body: 有谁知道作者的TED视频叫什么名字吗
ipv6 is supported now? i see that the issue in the github is considered "Yes, with ZeroNet bootstrap protocol It's no longer a problem."

> [nofish](#comment_247_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): No ipv6 support yet, but it's planned for this year.

thanks for your reply, it is a good news for me to see the ipv6 can be realized in this year. :）

> [chikan](#comment_1_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB): Why I can't update by clicking on ZeroHello ->"Version" -> "Update" ?I've done this a lot of time, but it does nothing .

It also can work for me.
